name: Coppercat 3000
description: Coppercat 3000 is a unique oscilloscope-themed robot, part of the prestigious WebtrES club. Equipped with its trusty soldier buttons and sturdy foundry arms and legs, this robot boasts incredible strength and durability. Despite its broken screen, Coppercat 3000 continues to serve its purpose with unwavering commitment. To protect itself from potential hazards, it wears a protective helmet as an additional feature. With its distinct appearance and superior functionality, Coppercat 3000 is a prized possession for any collector.
